alert.note: Alert for Upper Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 18 at 7:56PM PST until November 19 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST SUNDAY FOR WESTERN KITTITAS COUNTY... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3500 feet for Western Kittitas County. Total snow accumulations 6 to 10 inches above 3500 feet. Up to 3 inches along Interstate 90 east of Snoqualmie Summit. * WHERE...Upper Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 3 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.

area.areaDesc: Upper Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest
